# samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_user (Data Source)

Show User.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_user" "user" {
  account_id = var.account_id
  user_id = var.user_id
}


output "user" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_iam_user.user
}


variable "account_id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}

variable "user_id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
